DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of intravitreal implant of dexamethasone for the treatment of diabetic edema.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of SK-0503 for Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Diabetic macular edema Criteria for visual acuity and macular thickness are met History of glaucoma Known steroidresponder Use of systemic steroids Use of Warfarin/Heparin Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
